-1.title: Jason's Story
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Killer Skyline
1.plot: Gus tackles a horrible L.A skyline tattoo but the pain is too much for his client, Tommy covers a pot leaf that's ruining a guy's job prospects, and Jasmine tries to give her client his swag back by inking over an ex's portrait.

2.title: Dragon Slayer
2.plot: Gus attempts to cover a dragon tramp stamp that's ruining the client's sex life, Tommy runs into a complicated fix of a man's belly button tattoo, and Jasmine has the weight of an emotional Marine riding on her tattoo overhaul.

3.title: Pinup Problems
3.plot: Jasmine tries to cover tribal flames and put a prank in the past, Gus attempts a full back piece to cover a client's original tattoo, while Tommy works on super fan with a busted pinup but his fix runs into major problems.

4.title: Butt Pirate
4.plot: A client hopes Gus can design a pirate to cover his Vegas mistake, Tommy is asked to memorialize a guy's dead parents with dead parrots, while Jasmine struggles to make a tribal art tat a distant memory for her client.

5.title: Teabag Tattoo
5.plot: Jasmine regrets agreeing to attempt a coverup next to a personal trainer's crotch. Tommy tries to give his customer a proper tribute to her mom and sister by covering up a giant "DGAF" tattoo on her back.

6.title: Burn Baby Burn
6.plot: Jasmine is shocked when her client reveals a burning American flag tattoo that he wants covered. Gus struggles to cover up a rockers biggest tribal embarrassment.

7.title: Don't Call It a Tramp Stamp
7.plot: Big Gus tries to help a young mother put her dark criminal past behind her. Jasmine takes on a horrible tribal done by a famous rockstar that is ruining her client's life.

8.title: Tribute Trouble
8.plot: Big Gus tackles a delivery guy's jacked-up tribute to his ex-wife that he traded for a pizza. Tommy tries to help a distraught southern gentleman with his son's mixed up initials on his chest.

1.title: Krysta's Story
1.plot: Tommy attempts to cover up a girl's tattoo nightmare that has nearly ruined her relationship with her mother; Gus tries to cover a very large, offensive tattoo; a simple tattoo poses a challenging cover up project for Jasmine.

2.title: Starfish Booty
2.plot: Tommy tackles bare cartoon breasts on a man's shoulder. Jasmine is caught off guard by a racist tattoo on a country boys arm and Gus struggles to keep cool while covering up a flower inside a girl's butt crack.

3.title: Unholy Cross
3.plot: Tommy goes up against a cross made of penises on a man's chest, Jasmine struggles with a girl who was horribly wronged by her friend & Gus takes on the shop's first & most extreme head tattoo to come through the door.

4.title: Tattoo Secrets
4.plot: Jasmine is shocked by a client who reveals a heart wrenching secret to his wife, Tommy tackles the story of a girl betrayed by her own parents and Gus takes on the shop's wildest cover up yet: 8 nipples on a man's chest.

5.title: Good Girl Gone Bad
5.plot: A seemingly innocent suburban girl shows Gus a nasty "F**k the Police" tat, Jasmine tries to turn a horrific demon clown into an angel & Tommy attempts to mend a tattoo so bad it sent a client's grandfather to his grave.

6.title: Behind the 8 Ball
6.plot: A softball coach with the words "Bitch Please" on his neck turns to Tommy for redemption, Gus tries to help a lady with an incriminating 8 ball & Jasmine's client faces a tat so serious it could send him to the hospital.

8.title: Holy Hank!
8.plot: Gus attempts to rescue a boisterous girl from the grips of an evil vampire squid, Jasmine tries to help a confused man with a mixed up national identity & Tommy calls upon the saints to help cover a cop's past failures.

9.title: Fire Crotch
9.plot: When she looks at her tattoo she sees a gorgeous phoenix, when everyone else looks at it they see a firecrotch.

10.title: Pony Boy
10.plot: Jasmine ponies up for the only cop on the force with a cute tattoo, Tommy buries a banner & a horrible nickname at the same time, & Gus finds out that not every cover up is served with whipped cream and a cherry on top.

11.title: Rib Shots and Breast-aurants
11.plot: Jasmine's tough guy client turns soft when she hits his ribs, Gus has his hands full with a busty pin-up girl, and Tommy takes on Tattoo Nightmare's first-ever accidentally racist tattoo.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Real people with really bad tattoos seek the help of three of the best cover-up artists in the business to fix them. Tattoo artists Tommy Helm, Big Gus and Jasmine Rodriguez work miracles to turn disasterpieces into masterpieces.

13.title: I Do's and Bad Tattoos
13.plot: Jasmine struggles to free her client from the pain of his jailhouse past. Gus helps a young girl prove that she is no one's property and Tommy bares witness to Tattoo Nightmares first ever engagement proposal!

14.title: All In
14.plot: Jasmine reaches out to the most distraught client to ever come through the door. Tommy gets caught off guard by two horny lizards and Gus goes all in for a gambler with a cruel strangers face tattooed on his arm.

15.title: The Scrambler
15.plot: Gus scrambles to help a man cover a tragic memory that's been haunting him, Jasmine tries her luck at a very unlucky tattoo, and Tommy cleans up after an extremely messy con artist.

16.title: Jumping the Gun
16.plot: Jasmine attempts to exorcize an Irish curse that left her client writhing on the side of the road. Tommy tries to erase the scars left behind by a con-man & Gus reaches out to a man shaken by a disturbing carnival tragedy.

17.title: Ink Disasters
17.plot: Tommy takes on a girl's duckface that has everyone laughing at her. Gus pledges to cover a tattoo so bad it ended a college career and Jasmine goes head to head with a sperm shaped tattoo that could ruin her client's sex life.

18.title: Big Norma's House
18.plot: Tommy reunites with Bradley from "Ink Master" for a final shot at redemption, Gus goes up against a butterfly riddled with physical & emotional scars and Jasmine attempts to uncover a wounded soldier's horrible secret.

19.title: Branding Is No Way to Tattoo
19.plot: Gus tries to heal the burns left by the world's worst bunny tattoo, Jasmine washes away the sins of a girl's blasphemous mistake, and Tommy attempts to correct a $6000 mistake that sent his client's wife into labor.

22.title: Murder Boner
22.plot: A client stuns Jasmine by revealing the identity of a woman from his past, Gus attempts to cover a knife wielding penis tattoo that has a soldier in trouble & Tommy takes on a mistake that left his client branded "slut" for life

25.title: Hatchet Girl
25.plot: Gus confronts a gory tattoo inspired by a secret fetish, Tommy battles a satanic symbol that has one client's mother in tears, while Jasmine rids a man of a lifetime of bullying.

26.title: Wolf Grind
26.plot: A client stuns Gus with the shocking secret of her two-timing ex, a cage fighter pleads with Tommy to release him from a tattoo causing him daily beatings and Jasmine struggles to keep a client from removing his tattoo.

35.title: Amber
35.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

53.title: Steve's Story
53.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: The Ladykiller
1.plot: Gus is dubbed "the ladykiller" after a terrifying incident with a client, Jasmine puts out her client's flaming mistake in an oh-so sensitive area, and Tommy rescues his client from a tattoo so horrible it almost killed him.

2.title: Cross and Bongs
2.plot: Tommy "crosses" paths with a horrible reminder of his past, while Big Gus gets down and dirty to save a client's impending marriage, and Jasmine does everything she can to "smoke out" her client's disastrous tattoo.

3.title: You've Got Male
3.plot: A client flashes Tommy with an obscene portrait of his manhood, Jasmine swears off a mother's profane mistake from her rebellious past, and a client stuns Gus with his unconventional self-attempts at tattoo removal.

4.title: Penis Neck
4.plot: Tommy vows to cover a portrait so terrible, it has dishonored his client's entire family, Gus rocks out a musician's bad ink to help him get his edge back, and Jasmine rescues a superhero fan from a phallic mishap on his back.

5.title: Doggie Style
5.plot: Tommy goes Renegade as he revamps a dated tattoo of an 80s heartthrob, Jasmine rescues a police officer from a tattoo that's held him hostage for years, and Gus is exposed to a client's sexual history that sent her to jail.

6.title: Baywatch Bimbo!
6.plot: Jasmine rescues a former 90's beach babe, whose bad ink is drowning her career, Big Gus' client is eager to drop his pants to change his game, and Tommy helps a father honor his son by knocking out his adolescent mistake.

7.title: U-F-OH NO!!
7.plot: Jasmine attempts a major touch-up on an unfortunate celebrity portrait, Big Gus signs up to help a client get rid of the wrong number, and Tommy has flashbacks when an ex-raver begs him to cover-up a past alien encounter.

8.title: No One's Bitch
8.plot: Gus helps a mother wanting to leave her bad-ass days behind, Jasmine's client is ready to grow up and stop being a baby, and Tommy takes a stab at the ink that's been haunting his client for 13 years.

10.title: Junk Off My Trunk!
10.plot: Jasmine helps her client "smooth" over a mASSive mistake, Gus is tasked with erasing the memory of his client's son, and Tommy hopes to get lucky breaking his client's cursed tattoo gamble.

11.title: Friends Don't Let Friends Tattoo
11.plot: Gus needs more than garlic to ward off his client's crazy past; Jasmine relates to a mother's need for a classy new look, while Tommy rolls the dice with his and Jaz's reputations when he's challenged with his coworkers coverup.

12.title: Hashtag Horrible
12.plot: Jasmine gets stuck in an unfortunate threesome when her client drops his pants, Big Gus is needed stat to fix this goofy tattoo that destroyed a family, while Tommy tries to give his client's tattoo a second life.

13.title: Broke and Branded
13.plot: Tommy has his client's number in his crosshairs as he works to kill some bad ink, while Jasmine helps a beauty expert shine light on her beast of a tattoo, and Gus is double-teamed by a couple hoping to strip away a past mistake.

14.title: Fl(Ex) Wives
14.plot: A bodybuilder comes to Big Gus hoping to lift his spirits and get his wife off his back, while Jasmine helps a father give the boot to some bad ink, and a stripper drops her pants so Tommy can get down and dirty.

15.title: Unlucky Fate
15.plot: An innocent girl gets gullible when she wants nothing more than a tattoo.

16.title: Broke and Branded
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Bad Luck of the Irish
17.plot: A man is badly scarred in more ways than one as he tearfully asks Jasmine for help, while Tommy's client wants to lose her bestie, who's been following behind her for years, and a man needs Big Gus to help change his luck.

18.title: Cops and Rockers
18.plot: Gus attempts to fix four heavy-duty mistakes that test his "metal," Jasmine finds some common ground with her client's ex boyfriend woes, and Tommy locks horns with a guy who was in over his head.

19.title: Love Triangle Tears Best Friends Apart
19.plot: A surfer comes to Gus hoping to wash away a mistake and win back his father, while Tommy rushes to the scene for an accident-prone paramedic, and Jasmine's client is desperate to ex-out his ink in time for an important reunion.

24.title: Mermaids, Goblins, and Snakes, Oh My!
24.plot: Jasmine is suspicious of her client's mermaid mistake, while Tommy takes on the result of a back (and bone) breaking sexcapade, and a man trips out Big Gus with his magical adventures with a green creature sidekick.

25.title: Mama's Boy
25.plot: A feuding family asks Jasmine to lend them a helping hand, while Gus assists an army wife who wants to surprise her returning husband, and Tommy plays the name game with a client who's mommy issues have gone too far.

26.title: Merry Inkmas
26.plot: It's the holidays, as Gus ties his client's new ink up with a bow, Tommy tries to freeze out a man's yuletide eggnog disaster, and Jasmine shakes it up when a tough guy drops his drawers hoping for a new Christmas package.

314.title: What Would Jasmine Do
314.plot: Big Gus helps a fellow father hit a home-run with some new ink, while Jasmine hopes for a miracle when she is faced with a Bible Belt blooper, and a woman's mystical mishap forces Tommy to work his magic.

1.title: Racist to a Pervert
1.plot: Gus takes on one man's plea to escape his perverted past, Jasmine rescues a client who left her last artist barely clinging to life, and Tommy attempts to grant his client's desperate wish to restore his manhood.

2.title: Corbin
2.plot: Tommy "crosses" paths with a horrible reminder of his past, while Big Gus gets down and dirty to save a client's impending marriage, and Jasmine does everything she can to "smoke out" her client's disastrous tattoo.

locations: 10500 Magnolia Boulevard, North Hollywood, California, USA::(Madison Tattoo Shoppe, sign changed for filming)
imdb.plot outline: Show chronicles the horror stories behind people's unfortunate tattoos and their attempts to fix them. The series, will include tattoos ranging from the hilarious to downright disturbing, with reenactments that will show how these people wound up with their ink. The show's contestants will then go under the needle to remove or cover them.
imdb.title: Tattoo Nightmares
plot: Show chronicles the horror stories behind people's unfortunate tattoos and their attempts to fix them. The series, will include tattoos ranging from the hilarious to downright disturbing, with reenactments that will show how these people wound up with their ink. The show's contestants will then go under the needle to remove or cover them.::Spike TV
